description:
Dot thinks the sunken ship in the lagoon might belong to pirates!  
Help Dot use sonar to search for lost treasure!

puzzles.description: Make Dot automatically turn on cyan lights then automatically turn on one eye light.
Make Dot automatically move the eye light in a clockwise circle around the eye ring.
After the last eye ring, make Dot automatically play an FX sound. Then make Dot instantly turn on white lights.

hints.description: Link the last Eye Ring to the FX sound using an Auto cue. Link the sound to the White light using an Instant cue.

puzzles.description: Make Dot automatically loop the program forever.

hints.description: Make a loop! Link the states with an Auto cue.
